name: 東方 酔った幽霊 ~ Valley of Palliative Spirits
name_original: 東方 酔った幽霊 ~ Valley of Palliative Spirits
description:
Game made in 3 days for the 9th Touhou Fan Game Jam - Ghosts and Goblins.

Play as Kasodani Kyouko who wakes up early to clean the temple gates only to find the entire place trashed and swarming with ghosts! Carry your broom against the filth, clean the temple and find the culprit!

Getting hit by ghosts causes Kyouko to drop her broom, without it she can't clean! Getting hit without a broom is a game over.

Controls:
Arrowkeys, wasd, left control stick, dpad - movement
J/X/A button - Attack
